full_text: Case1:22-cr-00333-PAIN Document 47701-1 Filed 11/18/21 Page 22 of 22 2. For avoidance of doubt, courtroom sketch artists may confer with the Court or counsel for either party to determine whether a witness is a Protected Witness. SO ORDERED: Dated: New York, New York November 18, 2021 Alison J. Nathan HONORABLE ALISON J. NATHAN United States District Judge 2 DOJ-OGR-00007346
